name: Demigod
summary: The all father has vanished, creating an opening in the pantheon. To fill the void, Demigods from across from the mortal world must wage war against one another in a bid to ascend to true godhood.

esrb.synopsis: This is a fantasy strategy game in which players wage warfare as one of several demigods to earn the right to ascend to godhood. Presented from a top-down perspective, the game allows players to fight a variety of demigods and creatures on maze-like battlefields that hover above fire, amidst clouds, and sometimes within dungeon-like atmospheres. Players can summon and direct their characters to use colorful magic attacks or battle creatures/demigods with hammers, swords, and axes. Green blood sometimes splashes from wounded creatures, and dark red stains are scattered throughout the environment. One female demigod is shown wearing a provocative outfit that barely covers her breasts and buttocks; her breasts sometimes bounce when she moves, and she occasionally makes suggestive comments (e.g., 'My eyes are up here' or 'Aren't you even a little tempted?'). Some character biographies contain brief references to infidelity, murder, and 'drunken debauchery.'

pegi.synopsis:
The content of this game is suitable for persons aged 12 years and over only.
It contains: Realistic looking violence towards non human looking characters - Non realistic looking violence towards human characters
This game allows the player to interact with other players ONLINE.
